name: ColdFusion: Avoid Templates with a low comment/code ratio
description: Templates should be documented. This reports shows all the Templates with less than a defined comment / code ratio. This ratio is a parameter of the rule and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Templates that have a low comment / code ratio.
It provides the following information: Template full name, comment / code ratio
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are sufficient comments within the Artifact.
